title: Russia: Citi Opens Private Banking Branch in St. Petersburg
summary: St. Petersburg - Citi announced the opening of a Citigold Private Client (CPC) branch to provide clients with exclusive banking services and the opportunity to make use of a range of premium-class privileges.
tag-1: Russia: Citi Opens Private Banking Branch in St. Petersburg
tag-3: St. Petersburg – Citi announced the opening of a Citigold Private Client (CPC) branch to provide clients with exclusive banking services and the opportunity to make use of a range of premium-class privileges.
tag-4: Focused on catering to the needs of high-net-worth clients, the concept of Citigold Private Client combines an individualized approach with more than 200 years of world experience and a profound understanding of the unique features of the Russian market. Participants of the Citigold Private Client program are served by high-caliber professionals in specialized branches. An experienced and professional team of portfolio consultants advise on and execute investment deals on behalf of clients, offering optimal solutions for client's investment needs.
tag-5: The CPC philosophy includes: independent investment advice and support by professional portfolio consultants working as a team under a personal relationship manager; a broad selection of investment instruments; specialized analytical reports on financial markets; the unique privileges of the premium cards Visa Infinite and MasterCard World Elite; and impeccable priority service.
tag-6: The branch on Italyanskaya, 5 is the second branch of this type to open in Russia. (The first opened in Moscow in 2012.)
tag-7: "Citigold Private Client represents a new level of client service," said Marc Luet, Citi Division Head for Central Eastern Europe at the branch opening ceremony. "This concept has successfully been implemented in Asia in key financial centers such as Hong Kong and Singapore. We are proud to be inaugurating this CPC branch in St. Petersburg, which is one of the key locations for Citi not only in Russia but also in EMEA, where we only have several branches of this type. This is testament to our confidence in the potential of the Russian market and in the growth of the affluence of our clients."
tag-8: Other participants of the inauguration ceremony included the Citi Consumer Business Manager Mikhail Berner, Russia Retail Banking Business Head Sergey Korotkov and St. Petersburg Branch Manager Ruslan Belyaev.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-10: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-11: ZAO Citibank was one of the first banks with foreign capital to enter the Russian market back in 1992. Today, Citibank is one of the country's largest banks, which offers corporate and private clients a wide range of products and services. To date, the bank has over 4,000 employees, branches and representative offices in major cities of Russia, Kazakhstan and Ukraine. For more information on Citibank Russia please visit www.citibank.ru.
